data.lyric:
[ti:Let Me Down Slowly]
[ar:Alec Benjamin/Alessia Cara]
[al:Let Me Down Slowly]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Let Me Down Slowly - Alec Benjamin/Alessia Cara (阿莱西娅 卡拉)
[00:00.48]Lyrics by：Alec Benjamin/Michale Pollack/Nolan Lambroza
[00:00.96]Alec Benjamin：
[00:06.95]This night is cold in the kingdom
[00:10.18]I can feel you fade away
[00:13.30]From the kitchen to the bathroom sink and
[00:16.57]Your steps keep me awake
[00:18.87]Don't cut me down throw me out leave me here to waste
[00:22.06]I once was a man with dignity and grace
[00:25.32]Now I'm slipping through the cracks of your cold embrace
[00:28.49]So please please
[00:31.71]Could you find a way to let me down slowly
[00:34.81]A little sympathy I hope you can show me
[00:38.09]If you wanna go then I'll be so lonely
[00:41.37]If you're leaving baby let me down slowly
[00:44.11]Let me down down
[00:45.27]Let me down down
[00:46.48]Let me down let me down
[00:48.05]Down let me down down
[00:49.59]Let me down
[00:50.95]If you wanna go then I'll be so lonely
[00:54.17]If you're leaving baby let me down slowly
[00:56.76]Alessia Cara：
[00:58.22]I hold on to little pieces of what we were
[01:04.58]I know we're long gone but take it easy
[01:07.99]Because it hurts
[01:10.19]Don't cut me down throw me out leave me here to waste
[01:13.27]I once was a girl with dignity and grace
[01:16.52]Now I'm slipping through the cracks of your cold embrace
[01:19.64]So please please
[01:22.92]Could you find a way to let me down slowly
[01:25.96]A little sympathy I hope you can show me
[01:29.30]If you wanna go then I'll be so lonely
[01:32.54]If you're leaving baby let me down slowly
[01:35.28]Let me down down
[01:36.45]Let me down down
[01:37.61]Let me down let me down
[01:39.21]Down let me down down
[01:40.88]Let me down
[01:42.15]If you wanna go then I'll be so lonely
[01:45.33]If you're leaving baby let me down slowly
[01:47.83]Both：
[01:48.19]And I can't stop myself from falling down
[01:54.54]And I can't stop myself from falling down
[02:00.97]And I can't stop myself from falling down
[02:07.36]And I can't stop myself from falling down
[02:14.10]Both：
[02:14.30]Could you find a way to let me down slowly
[02:17.20]A little sympathy I hope you can show me
[02:20.46]If you wanna go then I'll be so lonely
[02:23.73]If you're leaving baby let me down slowly
[02:26.54]Let me down down
[02:27.67]Let me down down
[02:28.90]Let me down let me down
[02:30.45]Down let me down down
[02:32.06]Let me down
[02:33.36]If you wanna go then I'll be so lonely
[02:36.53]If you're leaving baby let me down slowly
[02:39.77]If you wanna go then I'll be so lonely
[02:42.94]If you're leaving baby let me down slowly
data.trans:
[ti:让我坠入悲伤的谷底 Slowly]
[ar:Alec Benjamin/Alessia Cara]
[al:让我坠入悲伤的谷底 Slowly (feat. Alessia Cara)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.48]//
[00:00.96]//
[00:06.95]这国度的夜 寒风肆虐
[00:10.18]隐约觉察你欲离我而去
[00:13.30]从厨房到洗手池
[00:16.57]你的脚步声让我格外清醒
[00:18.87]请别与我就此一刀两断 也别将我抛弃让我自生自灭
[00:22.06]我曾也是个风度翩翩的男人
[00:25.32]如今我正慢慢挣脱你冰冷的怀抱
[00:28.49]算我求求你
[00:31.71]哪怕让我失望 也请多余些时间让我接受
[00:34.81]多希望你能对我有些许同情怜悯
[00:38.09]若是你去意已决 那我唯将享受这孤独
[00:41.37]若是已无法挽留 宝贝 也别让我瞬刻坠入谷底
[00:44.11]让我坠入悲伤的谷底
[00:45.27]让我坠入悲伤的谷底
[00:46.48]让我坠入悲伤的谷底
[00:48.05]让我坠入悲伤的谷底
[00:49.59]让我坠入悲伤的谷底
[00:50.95]若是你去意已决 那我唯将享受这孤独
[00:54.17]若是已无法挽留 宝贝 也别让我瞬刻坠入谷底
[00:56.76]//
[00:58.22]我仍珍藏着我们回忆的点点滴滴
[01:04.58]我知道我们已经分开很久了 但别紧张
[01:07.99]因为这让我心痛欲绝
[01:10.19]请别与我就此一刀两断 也别将我抛弃让我自生自灭
[01:13.27]我曾经是个优雅的女孩
[01:16.52]如今我正慢慢挣脱你冰冷的怀抱
[01:19.64]算我求求你
[01:22.92]哪怕让我失望 也请多余些时间让我接受
[01:25.96]多希望你能对我有些许同情怜悯
[01:29.30]若是你去意已决 那我唯将享受这孤独
[01:32.54]若是已无法挽留 宝贝 也别让我瞬刻坠入谷底
[01:35.28]让我坠入悲伤的谷底
[01:36.45]让我坠入悲伤的谷底
[01:37.61]让我坠入悲伤的谷底
[01:39.21]让我坠入悲伤的谷底
[01:40.88]让我坠入悲伤的谷底
[01:42.15]若是你去意已决 那我唯将享受这孤独
[01:45.33]若是已无法挽留 宝贝 也别让我瞬刻坠入谷底
[01:47.83]//
[01:48.19]我已情不自禁堕入这绝望深渊
[01:54.54]我已情不自禁堕入这绝望深渊
[02:00.97]我已情不自禁堕入这绝望深渊
[02:07.36]我已情不自禁堕入这绝望深渊
[02:14.10]//
[02:14.30]哪怕让我失望 也请多余些时间让我接受
[02:17.20]多希望你能对我有些许同情怜悯
[02:20.46]若是你去意已决 那我唯将享受这孤独
[02:23.73]若是已无法挽留 宝贝 也别让我瞬刻坠入谷底

[02:36.53]若是已无法挽留 宝贝 也别让我瞬刻坠入谷底
